title: New: Monster Rally – Crystal Ball
body: Artwork by [Lukasz Wierzbowski](http://www.flickr.com/photos/neon_tambourine/) **Monster Rally**’s last LP, _Coral_, was a sun infused delight. The tunes were short, incessantly blissful and managed transport listeners to tropical shores regardless of the weather in their general radius. _Crystal Ball_ does this and more; it’s groove soaked and hazy, laid back but never boring, ultimately it’s like nothing released so far this summer. Stream and download the album below. Crystal Ball by Monster Rally
